member.summary: Gets or sets custom user id which can be used to enable tracking app sessions per user.

member.summary: Unique id for the current app session.

member.name: P:Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.Telemetry.WindowsStore.ClientAnalyticsSession.ApplicationInsightsId
member.summary: Gets the application key you provided to Start().

member.name: P:Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.Telemetry.WindowsStore.ClientAnalyticsSession.ResumeAppRestartTimeout
member.summary: Indicates time interval in seconds after which, for a suspended application session, Client Analytics will consider the data collection session as complete. If the application resumes after this time interval, Client Analytics will start new data collection session and reports will show more than one session. The default interval is 5 seconds.

member.name: P:Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.Telemetry.WindowsStore.ClientAnalyticsSession.Enabled
member.summary: Set to false to disable client analytics data collection and transfer. Default is true.

member.name: M:Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.Telemetry.WindowsStore.ClientAnalyticsSession.Start(System.String)
member.summary: Enables Default ClientAnalyticsChannel to collect data.
member.param: Provide the application key you got from the Application Insights service.

member.summary: Enables starting and configuring Client Analytics Sessions.
